```{r message=FALSE}
#Installing Packages
library(sqldf)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r echo=FALSE}
#Read in datafiles
species<-read.csv("site_by_species.csv") 

var<-read.csv("site_by_variables.csv")
```

# Take a look at the datasets first:

```{r}
head(species)

head(var)
```
# Start with operations using 1 file

## How to subset rows

dplyr Method:
```{r}
#Dplyr method-uses the filter() method
species<-filter(species, Site<30)
var<-filter(var, Site<30)
```


SQL Method
```{r}
#SQL Method
query="
SELECT Site, Sp1, Sp2, Sp3 
FROM species
WHERE Site<'30'
"
sqldf(query)
```
